name: Jessica Lin
persona: Jessica Lin is a 20-year-old Biology major with a CGPA of 3.21. She is motivated to achieve good grades and generally believes in her academic abilities, but sometimes struggles with maintaining consistent self-discipline. While she experiences some test anxiety, she is able to persevere through challenges and keeps her long-term goals in mind. Jessica is conscientious in her studies and is always looking for ways to improve her performance.
